subject: Happy New Year To You.
body:
Happy New Year To You.
I have to inform you again, that we are not playing over this, I know my reason for the continuous sending of this notification to you, the fact is that you can't seem to trust any one again over this payment and we have now curt the prize of $250 to $25 for what you have been in cantered in many months ago OR years ago, but I want you to trust me now for the truth of God about this fund release, I promise that i will not fail my word as i said OK and i will make sure that you get this fund receive as soon as possible. Just try all best to get this fee of $25 sent as an instruction we give you in this email now.
I cannot scam you for $25 it is for bank processing of your payment,the fees is $250 but we have curt to $25 so that you can be able to send it today, $25 is clearly written to you before, and the good part of this, is that you will never, ever be disturbed again over any kind of payment, this is final, and the forms from there becomes effective once we submit your payment application processing fee and pay the form fee of $25 I don't want you to lose this fund
this time, because you may never get another such good opportunity, the federal government is keen and very determined to pay your overdue debts, this is not a fluke, I would not want you to lose this fund out of ignorance, I will send you all the documents as soon as bank payment processing fee is paid, you have to trust me, you will get your fund, find a way to get $25 you will not lose it,instead it will bring your financial breakthrough, find the money and send it to our bursary.
The reason why am sending you this because I want you to receive your USD$2,500,000.00 immediately we are trying to round up for this payment program.The processing charges which was initially on the high price has been cut down by the payout bank considering the poor economic situations that make it difficult for the middle class citizens to meet up with the processing charges of their entitlement. Upon the confirmation of your processing charges you will get your $2.500, 000.00 into your account within 30 hrs.
Finally my advice to you is not to abandon this transaction because of the requirement of ($25) Account Officer Info: 
Send the fee through Money Gram, Or Western Union only. OR I will advise you to go straight to the Walmart nearest to you or the Apple store buy an iTunes Card of the $25 scratched attached to it and send it to me immediately.
YOU CAN AS WELL SEND US AN GOOGLE-PLAY CARD OF $25, OR ITUNES CARD OF $25  OR  STEAM WALLET OF $25
As soon as the payment is received today, you will receive your $2,500,000.00 the same today without any delay.
Mr. Richard Silver
Manager Officer

subject: Re: Happy New Year To You.
body:
Happy New Year to you too!

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I understand that you want me to trust you regarding the release of this fund. Can you please provide more information about the payment processing fee? What is it specifically for and why is it necessary?

I appreciate your assurance that this is not a scam, but I would like to know more about the steps involved in receiving the funds. Can you explain the process in detail?

Also, could you clarify why the payout bank has reduced the processing charges? Is there a specific reason for this reduction?

Lastly, can you provide any references or testimonials from previous clients who have successfully received their funds through your services? It would help build my trust in this process.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Best wishes,
Ronald
